bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. I make honey for us all. What am I?
I have pretty wings and fly in the air. I start as a caterpillar, and then change my hair. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I change a lot as I grow.
🌷 I like to land on flowers.

bug.question: I'm small and red, and have black spots. I'm good luck, or so everyone thought! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat aphids in the garden.
⚫ I have round spots on my back.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry food. I live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live with many of my friends and family.
💪 I can lift things much bigger than me!

bug.question: I jump so high with strong legs. I am green and eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I can hop far, but I am not a frog

bug.question: I have a long body with many legs. I hide under rocks and logs. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ When scared, I roll into a ball.
💯 I have a lot of legs.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ Some people are scared of me.
🍽️ I eat insects that get stuck in my web.

bug.question: I light up at night, a twinkling little sight. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 My light helps me find a friend.

bug.question: I buzz around your head and might give you a bite. You will scratch and itch. What am I?

hints.text: 🚫 You don't want me to bite you!

bug.question: I look like a stick. I like to hide in trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like part of a tree.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white, what am I?

hints.text: ☃️ You can make a snowman with me.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.

weather.question: I make the trees dance and sometimes blow your hat away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🌬️ You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: I come from the sky and make everything wet. You need an umbrella when I fall. What am I?
I'm a big white fluffy thing that floats in the sky. What am I?
Sometimes after the rain, you can see me in the sky, with all the colors of the rainbow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ You need sunshine and rain to see me.
✨ I am curved like a smile.

weather.question: I'm a loud noise that comes from the sky during a storm, and sometimes I'm followed by a flash of light. What am I?

hints.text: 👂 You can hear me far away.

weather.question: I'm really cold air that can freeze water into ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 Animals like penguins live where I am.

weather.question: I'm a big storm with strong winds that spin around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can lift things up into the air.
🏠 I can be very dangerous for houses.

weather.question: I am a type of precipitation that is both rain and snow mixed together. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️+❄️ I am a mix of two types of precipitation.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.
